Column.Name: Claimed
% Claimed
Column.Formula: IFERROR( ([Claimed] / [Total Contract Value]) * 100, 0 )

Column.Name: Remaining
Column.Formula: [Total Contract Value] - [Claimed]

Column.Name: Total Claimed
Column.Formula: SUM(EACH [Item Claimed Amount])

Column.Name: Total Amount
Column.Formula: SUM(EACH [Item Contracted Amount])

Column.Name: Remaining Unclaimed
Column.Formula: [Total Amount] - [Total Claimed]

Column.Name: ID
Column.Formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK([Description of Work])), [Section Heading ID] & "." & ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [Section Heading ID],$(i, item) AND($i <= [LineNumber], $item = [Section Heading ID]#[LineNumber]))) - 1 )

Column.Name: Estimated Quantity
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading] == TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Qty or Amt]#[LineNumber] = "Amount" ), 1,
AND( [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Estimated Quantity]#[LineNumber] = NULL() ), 1,
[Estimated Quantity]#[LineNumber] )

Column.Name: Rate $
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading] == TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Rate $]#[LineNumber] = NULL() ), 0,
[Rate $]#[LineNumber] )

Column.Name: Unit
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading] == TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Qty or Amt]#[LineNumber] = "Amount" ), "Item",
AND( [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Unit]#[LineNumber] = NULL() ), "Item",
[Unit]#[LineNumber]
)

Column.Name: Item Claimed Amount
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading] == TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Qty or Amt]#[LineNumber] = "Quantity" ), HASH_GET([Claim Info], "Quantity Claimed") *[Rate $],
COALESCE( HASH_GET([Claim Info], "Amount Claimed"), 0)
)

Column.Name: Item Contracted Amount
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading] == TRUE, NULL(),
[Estimated Quantity] * [Rate $] )

Column.Name: % Complete
Section Heading
Column.Formula: IF( [Section Heading]#[LineNumber] = NULL(), FALSE, [Section Heading] )

Column.Name: Section Heading ID
Total Amount inc Tax
Column.Formula: [Total Amount] + [Tax]

Column.Name: ClaimID
Column.Formula: IF( ISBLANK([ClaimID]), MAX( DB_LOOKUPALL( "ClaimID", "Payment Certificate", HASH("LineNumber", 1), HASH("parent", ARRAY("Contract", [Contract RecordID])) ) ), [ClaimID] )

Column.Name: Unapproved Payment Certificate
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( $thisValue= TRUE, "Please finalise pending payment certificate before starting price revision", TRUE
)
Column.Formula: IFERROR( ARRAY_FIRST(ARRAY_FIRST( DB_REPORT( "COUNT([RecordID])", "Payment Certificate", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Status] <> 'Approved'", HASH("parent", ARRAY("Contract", [Contract RecordID])) ) )) > 0, NULL() )

Column.Name: Item Remaining Amount
Column.Formula: [Item Contracted Amount] - [Item Claimed Amount]

Column.Name: Vendor Access Enabled
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Vendor Access Enabled", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Enabled Vendor Actions
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Enabled Vendor Actions", "Contract", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Contract RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Total Claimed Percent
Column.Formula: IFERROR([Total Claimed] / [Total Amount] * 100, 0)

Column.Name: Qty or Amt
Column.Formula: IF( [Section Heading]#[LineNumber] == TRUE, NULL(), [Lump Sum Type] = "Quantity", "Quantity", [Lump Sum Type] = "Amount", "Amount", COALESCE([Qty or Amt]#[LineNumber], "Quantity") )

Column.Name: Item Remaining Quantity
Column.Formula: [Estimated Quantity] - [Item Claimed Quantity]

Column.Name: Claim Info
Item Claimed Quantity
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading] == TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Section Heading] <> TRUE, [Qty or Amt]#[LineNumber] = "Amount" ), NULL(),
HASH_GET([Claim Info], "Quantity Claimed") )

Column.Name: Tax
Column.Formula:
IF( [Tax Mode] = "Percentage", IF([Tax Percent] = 0, 0, [Total Amount] / 100 * [Tax Percent]),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax] )

Column.Name: Tax Percent
Column.Formula:
IF(
[Tax Mode] = "Value", IF( [Total Amount] = 0, 0, [Tax] / [Total Amount] * 100 ),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax Percent] )

Column.Name: Tax Mode
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Tax Mode], "Not Applicable")

Column.Name: Value Difference
Rate $ - Rate Only
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading - Rate Only] == TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Section Heading - Rate Only] <> TRUE, [Rate $ - Rate Only]#[LineNumber] = NULL() ), 0,
[Rate $ - Rate Only]#[LineNumber] )

Column.Name: Section Heading - Rate Only
Column.Formula: IF( [Section Heading - Rate Only]#[LineNumber] = NULL(), FALSE, [Section Heading - Rate Only] )

Column.Name: Section Heading ID - Rate Only
Unit - Rate Only
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading - Rate Only] == TRUE, NULL(),
AND( [Section Heading - Rate Only] <> TRUE, [Unit - Rate Only]#[LineNumber] = NULL() ), "Item",
[Unit - Rate Only]#[LineNumber]
)

Column.Name: ID - Rate Only
Wizard Options
Column.DefaultValueFormula: HASH( "Click to Navigate", TRUE, "Click Completed", FALSE, "Validation", TRUE )

Column.Name: Current Question
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( //Custom validation rules per question can be hooked in here /*AND( $thisValue = "Exemption Approval", FALSE //ARRAY_INDEXOF(ARRAY_SELECT(ARRAY_WHERE(HASH_KEYS([Wizard Validation]), $(i, item) $item <> "Approval"), $(i, item) HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Wizard Validation], $item), "Complete")), FALSE) > 0 ), "Ensure all steps are complete before submitting for approval",
AND( $thisValue = "Finish", IF( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], "Exemption Approval") > 0, [Exemption Approved] <> TRUE, FALSE ) ), "Ensure all steps are complete",
AND( $thisValue = "Roles", HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Wizard Validation], $thisValue), "Complete") <> TRUE ), "Ensure all required roles have been allocated", */
AND( $thisValue <> "Procurement Details", $thisValue <> "Finish", HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Wizard Validation], $thisValue), "Complete") <> TRUE, HASH_GET([Wizard Options], "Validation") = TRUE ), "Please answer all questions" )

Column.Name: New Rate $ - Rate Only
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ARRAY_LENGTH(ARRAY_WHERE(EACH [New Rate $ - Rate Only], $(i,item) $item <> [Rate $ - Rate Only]#$i)) = 0, "Specify at least one item to which the rate change is applicable", TRUE )

Column.Name: Select Item Rate
Column.Formula:
IF( [Section Heading - Rate Only]#[LineNumber] = TRUE, NULL, [Select Item Rate]#[LineNumber]
)

Column.Name: Rate Change Percent
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND([Rate Change Method] = "Percentage", $thisValue = 0), "Specify the applicable rate change percentage", TRUE )

Column.Name: New Price Review Date
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( AND( [Price Review Required] = TRUE, $thisValue = NULL ), "Enter next price review date", TRUE
)

Column.Name: Change Multiplier
Column.Formula: 1+ [Rate Change Percent]/100

Column.Name: Claimed - Rate Only
Mail Merge Options - Document Selection
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection], ARRAY_FIRST(HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options], "Custom Templates")))

Column.Name: Mail Merge Options
Mail Merge Options 2
Mail Merge Visible 2
Column.Formula: AND( [Navigation] = "Schedule", [Document Generation] = "Schedule of Rates (Rate Only)" )

Column.Name: Mail Merge Options - Document Selection 2
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Mail Merge Options - Document Selection 2], ARRAY_FIRST(HASH_GET([Mail Merge Options 2], "Custom Templates")))

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Parent Chain
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Parent Chain")

Column.Name: Contract Module Settings
Wizard - Process Properties
Column.Formula:
LET $processData := HASH( "Start", HASH( "Display Name", "Type",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([SOR Type] == NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Type", "Message", "Please specify the schedule of rates type")) ),
"Completion", [SOR Type] <> NULL ),
"Lump Sum", HASH( "Display Name", "Lump Sum",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Lump Sum Type] == NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Lump Sum Type", "Message", "Please specify the type(s) applicable for lump sum items")), IF([Lump Sum Setup Method] == NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Lump Sum Setup Method", "Message", "Please specify the lump sum data setup method")) ),
"Completion", AND( [Lump Sum Type] <> NULL, [Lump Sum Setup Method] <> NULL ) ),
"Items", HASH( "Display Name", "Items",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(AND([Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Confirm Items] <> TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Lump Sum Manual Entry", "Message", "Please confirm all lump sum item data has been provided")), IF(AND([Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Import", [Import Schedule] == NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Lump Sum Import", "Message", "Please provide a completed template for lump sum items")) ),
"Completion", OR( AND([Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Confirm Items] = TRUE), AND([Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Import", [Import Schedule] <> NULL) ) ),
"Rate Only", HASH( "Display Name", "Rate Only",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF([Rate List Setup Method] == NULL, HASH("Error ID", "Rate List Setup Method", "Message", "Please specify the rate list setup method")), IF(AND([Price Review Required] = TRUE, [Price Review Date] == NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Price Review Date", "Message", "Please specify the date of price review")) ),
"Completion", AND( [Rate List Setup Method] <> NULL, OR([Price Review Required] <> TRUE, [Price Review Date] <> NULL) ) ),
"Rate List", HASH( "Display Name", "Rate List",
"Validation", ARRAY( IF(AND([Rate List Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Confirm Rate List] <> TRUE), HASH("Error ID", "Rate List Manual Entry", "Message", "Please confirm all rate list data has been provided")), IF(AND([Rate List Setup Method] = "Import", [Import Rate List] == NULL), HASH("Error ID", "Rate List Import", "Message", "Please provide a completed rate list template")) ),
"Completion", OR( AND([Rate List Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Confirm Rate List] = TRUE), AND([Rate List Setup Method] = "Import", [Import Rate List] <> NULL) ) ) );
LET $transformed := ARRAY_SELECT( HASH_KEYS($processData), $(p, processKey) ( LET $processInformation := HASH_GET($processData, $processKey); LET $completionRules := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Completion"); LET $validationRules := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Validation"); LET $displayName := HASH_GET($processInformation, "Display Name");
LET $validationRules := ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_SELECT( $validationRules, $(i, item) IF($disableValidation <> TRUE, $item) ), $(i, item) $item <> NULL );
LET $displayName := COALESCE($displayName, $processKey);
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( ARRAY($displayName, $completionRules, $validationRules), ARRAY("Display Name", "Completion", "Validation"), ) ) );
RETURN INDEXES_TO_KEYS( $transformed, HASH_KEYS($processData) )

Column.Name: Value Difference Excl Tax
Rate Change Method
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( ISBLANK($thisValue), "Specify how change of rate will be applied", TRUE )

MergeField.Name: Schedule B Items
MergeField.Formula: ARRAY_TRANSPOSE( ARRAY( EACH [ID - Rate Only], EACH [Description of Work - Rate Only], EACH [Unit - Rate Only], EACH [Rate $ - Rate Only] ) )

MergeField.Name: Schedule Items
MergeField.Formula: ARRAY_TRANSPOSE( ARRAY( EACH [ID], EACH [Description of Work], EACH [Estimated Quantity], EACH [Unit], EACH [Rate $], EACH [Item Contracted Amount], EACH [% Complete], EACH [Item Claimed Amount], EACH [Qty or Amt] ) )

MergeField.Name: Lump Sum - Both Items
Lump Sum - Amount Items
Rate Only Items
Lump Sum - Quantity Items

Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY( "Schedule", "Functions", "Attachments" );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL)

"
"
AND( NOT([Section Heading]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Description of Work]) > [LineNumber] )

LET $paymentsSupported := ARRAY_INDEXOF( HASH_GET( [Contract Module Settings], "Profile Supported Functions" ), "Payment Certificates" ) > 0;
RETURN AND( [Navigation] = "Schedule", $paymentsSupported <> TRUE, OR([SOR Type] = "Lump Sum", [SOR Type] = "Mix") )
AND( NOT([Section Heading]), [Lump Sum Type] <> "Quantity", [Lump Sum Type] <> "Amount" )
AND( NOT([Section Heading]), [Lump Sum Type] <> "Quantity", [Lump Sum Type] <> "Amount" )
AND( NOT([Section Heading]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Description of Work]) > [LineNumber] )

LET $paymentsSupported := ARRAY_INDEXOF( HASH_GET( [Contract Module Settings], "Profile Supported Functions" ), "Payment Certificates" ) > 0;
RETURN AND( [Navigation] = "Schedule", $paymentsSupported = TRUE, OR([SOR Type] = "Lump Sum", [SOR Type] = "Mix") )

"

ELSE NULL END

ELSE NULL END

CASE WHEN [Section Heading - Rate Only] = TRUE THEN '#ffffff'
ELSE 'black' END

)

"

)

)

)

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $columns := ARRAY( "Select Item Rate", "Section Heading - Rate Only", "ID - Rate Only", "Description of Work - Rate Only", "Unit - Rate Only", "Rate $ - Rate Only", "New Rate $ - Rate Only" ); LET $values := ARRAY_SELECT($columns, $(i, col) CURRENT_EACHVALUE($col)); LET $result := INDEXES_TO_KEYS($values, $columns); LET $append := HASH( "Status", ARRAY("Archived"), "Parent RecordID", ARRAY([RecordID]), "Date of Review", ARRAY(NOW()), "Rate Change Percent", ARRAY([Rate Change Percent]) );
RETURN HASH_MERGE($result, $append)

Binding.Expression:
LET $controlHeight := 6 * 10; LET $controlWidth := 54 * 20; LET $selectedStageColour := "#4682B4"; LET $notselectedStageColour := "#304a60"; LET $disabledColour := "#d5d1d1";
LET $verticalPadding := $controlHeight / 4; LET $numberOfStages := ARRAY_LENGTH(HASH_KEYS([Wizard Questions]));
RETURN " <style>
.core-chevron-navigation li div span { " & IF( $numberOfStages = 1, "padding-left: 50px;",
AND($numberOfStages >= 2, $numberOfStages <= 4), "padding-left: 25px;",
AND($numberOfStages >= 5, $numberOfStages <= 7), "padding-left: 15px;",
$numberOfStages >= 8, "padding-left: 5px; font-size: 13px;" ) & " }
.core-chevron-navigation li { flex: 100%; padding: 1px;" &
IF( $numberOfStages <= 3, "margin: 0 0 0 -53px;",
$numberOfStages = 4, "margin: 0 0 0 -40px;",
AND($numberOfStages >= 5, $numberOfStages <= 7), "margin: 0 0 0 -27px;",
$numberOfStages >= 8, "margin: 0 0 0 -14px;" ) &
IF( $numberOfStages <= 3, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 86% 0%, 96% 50%, 86% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages = 4, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 86% 0%, 96% 50%, 86% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages >= 5, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(10% 50%, 0% 0%, 87% 0%, 97% 50%, 87% 100%, 0% 100%);" ) & " } .core-chevron-navigation li:last-child { " & IF( $numberOfStages = 1, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, calc(100% - 6px) 0%, calc(100% - 6px) 50%, calc(100% - 6px) 100%, 1% 100%); text-align: center;",
$numberOfStages = 2, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, calc(100% - 3px) 0%, calc(100% - 3px) 50%, calc(100% - 3px) 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages = 3, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages = 4, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(11% 50%, 1% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 1% 100%);",
$numberOfStages >= 5, "-webkit-clip-path: polygon(10% 50%, 0% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 50%, 100% 100%, 0% 100%);" ) & " } </style> "

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.core-process-icon-container{
  background: white; 
  border-radius: 100%; 
  border: 3px solid;
  padding: 5px; 
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.core-chevron-navigation
{
  padding-inline-start: 10px;
  font-weight: bold; 
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 16px;
}
.core-chevron-navigation li
{
  text-decoration: none;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected
{
  color: #1E70B5; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation .selected div
{
  color: #1E70B5;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .notselected div
{ 
  color: black;
}

.core-chevron-navigation .disabled div
{
  background: #f8f9fa !important; 
  color: #bcbcbc; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li div span
{
  padding-top: 17px; 
}

.core-chevron-navigation li:hover
{
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-chevron-navigation li div{
  height: 100%; 
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 4px;
}
.core-process-container
{
  display: inline-flex; 
  position: relative; 
  width: 100%; 
}
.core-process-svg-container div
{
  width: 100%; 
  height: 100%; 
}
.core-process-navigation {
  display: flex;
  list-style: none;
  position: relative;
  margin: 0;
  height: 100%;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding-inline-start: 0px;
  text-align: center; 
}
.core-process-line-dot {
  border-color: transparent;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 5px; 
}
.core-process-navigation li {
  flex: 100%;
}
.core-line-between-processes
{
  z-index: 2; 
  height: 2px; 
  position: absolute; 
  width: 50%; 
  top: 14px;
}
.core-process-svg-container
{
  padding-left: 50%; 
  margin-left: -16px; 
  z-index: 2;
  height: 30px; 
  width: 30px;
  cursor: pointer; 
}
.core-process-text-container
{
  z-index: 2;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1E70B5;
  font-size: 14px;
  padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px;
}
</style>

Binding.Expression: AND( [Setup Complete] <> TRUE, [Wizard Status] <> "Not Started", [Wizard Status] <> "Restarted", [Current Question] <> NULL )

"
"

Label.Text: To help ensure this schedule of rates is set up correctly, you will be taken through a brief setup wizard. You will need to have all item information to hand.
Select the type of rates applicable

Binding.Expression: ARRAY( HASH("value", "Lump Sum", "text", "Contract has an agreed lump sum value"), HASH("value", "Rate Only", "text", "List of unit rates with no defined quantity or value"), HASH("value", "Mix", "text", "Contract has both agreed value and list of unit rates") )

Label.Text: Select the type of tax applied
Enter the tax amount applicable to the schedule of rates

Binding.Expression: AND( OR( [Wizard Status] = "Not Started", [Wizard Status] = "Restarted" ), [Tax Mode] = "Value" )

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $cols:= ARRAY( "Section Heading", "Section Heading ID", "ID", "Description of Work", "Item Contracted Amount", "Estimated Quantity", "Unit", "Rate $", "Qty or Amt", "Confirm Items" );
RETURN ARRAY_TO_HASH( $cols, $(i,item) $item, $(i,item) ARRAY(NULL) )

LET $cols:= ARRAY( "Section Heading - Rate Only", "Section Heading ID - Rate Only", "ID - Rate Only", "Description of Work - Rate Only", "Rate $ - Rate Only", "Unit - Rate Only", "Confirm Rate List" );
RETURN ARRAY_TO_HASH( $cols, $(i,item) $item, $(i,item) ARRAY(NULL) )

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: Cancelling this schedule of rates will result in its deletion. This record and all its associated information will be lost. Click Confirm to cancel and delete this schedule of rates.

Binding.Expression: //All of these are here to stop irrecoverable data from being lost OR( HASH_GET([Current User Permissions], "write") <> TRUE, //only users with write access can press cancel [Procurement RecordID] <> NULL, //checks for an associated Procurement [Source] <> NULL, //checks if this was created via integration HASH_GET([Submission Data], "Draft") > 0, //can't be deleted while under approval HASH_GET([Submission Data], "Submitted") > 0, //can't be deleted while under approval [Approval to Initiate Contract Complete] = TRUE //can't be deleted once approved )
AND( [Deleting Record] = TRUE, OR( [Wizard Status] = "Not Started", [Wizard Status] = "Restarted" ) )

Label.Text: Specify the type applicable for lump sum items

Binding.Expression: ARRAY( HASH("value", "Amount", "text", "Contract has a fixed amount for each deliverable"), HASH("value", "Quantity", "text", "Deliverables are defined by a quantity or unit rate"), HASH("value", "Both", "text", "Deliverables are both fixed amounts and unit quantities or rates") )
LET $category := "Lump Sum"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

Label.Text: Select the input method for lump sum items

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Lump Sum"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )
LET $category := "Items"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

"
"

Label.Text: Using the template provided, enter your lump sum item data, then select "Import items" to upload this information to the schedule of rates.

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Items"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0, [Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Import" )

Label.Text: Enter lump sum items, then confirm all information has been added

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Items"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0, [Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Manual Entry" )

Information.Text: Use the checkbox to mark an item as a section heading

FieldEntry.Formula: IF([Section Heading], ARRAY_FIRST(COALESCE(ARRAY_REVERSE(EACH [Section Heading ID]))) + 1, NULL())

Binding.Expression: AND( NOT([Section Heading]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Description of Work]) > [LineNumber] )

LET $category := "Items"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Lump Sum Type] = "Quantity", [Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

Information.Text: Use the checkbox to mark an item as a section heading

FieldEntry.Formula: IF([Section Heading], ARRAY_FIRST(COALESCE(ARRAY_REVERSE(EACH [Section Heading ID]))) + 1, NULL())

Binding.Expression: AND( NOT([Section Heading]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Description of Work]) > [LineNumber] )

LET $category := "Items"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Lump Sum Type] = "Amount", [Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

Information.Text: Use the checkbox to mark an item as a section heading

FieldEntry.Formula: IF([Section Heading], ARRAY_FIRST(COALESCE(ARRAY_REVERSE(EACH [Section Heading ID]))) + 1, NULL())

Binding.Expression: AND( NOT([Section Heading]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Description of Work]) > [LineNumber] )

LET $category := "Items"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Lump Sum Type] = "Both", [Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

IF( [Confirm Items] <> TRUE, "All items have been identified",
"Unlock and add more items" )

Information.Text: All item data has been added. If item information needs to be altered, you may unlock this section and add or update item information.

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Items"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0, [Lump Sum Setup Method] = "Manual Entry" )

Label.Text: Select the input method for rate list

Text.String: Import rate list using a template

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Rate Only"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

Label.Text: Specify whether a price review is required for rate list

Text.String: Price review is required for rate list

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Rate Only"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

Label.Text: Enter the date of the next rate review

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Rate Only"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", [Price Review Required] = TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )
LET $category := "Rate List"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

"
"

Label.Text: Using the template provided, enter your rate list, then select "Import rate list" to upload this information to the schedule of rates.

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Rate List"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0, [Rate List Setup Method] = "Import" )

Label.Text: Enter rate list, then confirm all information has been added

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Rate List"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0, [Rate List Setup Method] = "Manual Entry" )

Information.Text: Use the checkbox to mark an item as a section heading

Binding.Expression: AND( [Section Heading - Rate Only], ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Description of Work - Rate Only]) > [LineNumber] )
AND( NOT([Section Heading - Rate Only]), ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Description of Work - Rate Only]) > [LineNumber] )

FieldEntry.Formula: IF([Section Heading], ARRAY_FIRST(COALESCE(ARRAY_REVERSE(EACH [Section Heading ID]))) + 1, NULL())

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Rate List"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Rate List Setup Method] = "Manual Entry", [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0 )

IF( [Confirm Rate List] <> TRUE, "All items have been identified",
"Unlock and add more items" )

Information.Text: Rate list has been finalised. If item information needs to be altered, you may unlock this section and add or update item information.

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_CONCAT( EACH [Description of Work - Rate Only], "" )

Binding.Expression: LET $category := "Rate List"; RETURN AND( [Current Question] = $category, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Wizard Questions], $category) > 0, [Rate List Setup Method] = "Manual Entry" )

"
"

Label.Text: Below is a summary of this schedule of rates setup. Please review and finalise by clicking the Finish button.

Binding.Expression: IF( [SOR Type] = "Lump Sum", "Contract has an agreed lump sum value", [SOR Type] = "Rate Only", "List of unit rates with no defined quantity or value", [SOR Type] = "Mix", "Contract has both agreed value and list of unit rates" )

IF( [Lump Sum Type] = "Amount", "Contract has a fixed amount for each deliverable", [Lump Sum Type] = "Quantity", "Deliverables are defined by a quantity or unit rate", [Lump Sum Type] = "Both", "Deliverables are both fixed amounts and unit quantities or rates" )

Label.Text: Total value of lump sum items

Binding.Expression: AND( [Current Question] = "Finish", [SOR Type] <> "Rate Only", [Wizard Status] = "In Progress" )
AND( [Current Question] = "Finish", [SOR Type] <> "Lump Sum", [Price Review Date] <> NULL, [Wizard Status] = "In Progress" )
"Please ensure all mandatory fields are populated prior to finalising schedule of rates"

TextCriterion.Text: (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in a role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is the Vendor listed on the Contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( STEP TO [Vendor] ON [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in a role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is the Vendor listed on the Contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( STEP TO [Vendor] ON [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- Check if the user is granted access via the parent Contract WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- If the Contract RecordID is NULL, give Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in a role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- Check if the user is granted access via the parent Contract WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- If the Contract RecordID is NULL, give Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
ELSE FALSE END

Settings.LandingViewFormula: IF( [Setup Complete] <> TRUE, "Setup", AND($requestedView = "Setup", [Setup Complete] = TRUE), "Default", $requestedView )
